content.title: Blue Wings ‚Äî üê¶ Milestone
content.description:
Nine letters learned. Gubbi has been growing with every word.

They emerge from dense forest into a sun-drenched farm clearing. Cows, goats, chickens everywhere. Gubbi runs toward them ‚Äî and in the morning light, her wings catch the sun: BLUE. Electric, iridescent Neelakantha blue. The farm animals bow their heads. Arjun arrives from a different path and sees Gubbi's wings. "Okay," he says quietly. "Race is on."

content.question: They reached the farm! Animals everywhere! Do you want to be the richest person in the world?
The boy now has a big house, car, and beautiful things. What do we call such a life in Kannada?
The boy learned a new number called fifty! What is 'fifty' in Kannada?
Soon, he earned five hundred coins! What is 'five hundred' in Kannada?

screens.content: üéâ 10 levels done! Gubbi's feathers turned bright blue! The race to the summit is on!
